ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Well Met!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, and welcome to EverCrack!! :) ... ===== ~~~~~~~~~ And on the eighth day God said, O.K. Murphy. You take over. http://home.comcast.net/~melanieroark
ygData.messageBody:
Hello, and welcome to EverCrack!! :)


--- ferallady63 <ferallady63@...> wrote:

>
> Hail all;
> I just wanted to send a brief introduction..I
> haven't been playing
> long, just a few months and I tend to be a casual
> player. I play on
> Xegony and have 2 Toons there..Kailerii, Necromancer
> of the 10th Rank
> and a Barbarian Bst who is 7th rank. I also have a
> Bazaar Trader who
> is Vah-Shir.
>
> My Main, for now anyway, is my DE Necro who is a
> member of
> Darkmoon, however since I still enjoy playing both,
> and have yet to
> try any of the other race/class combos I haven't
> definitively set Kai
> as my Main.
>
> In rl I have 2 children (2 and 11) and a wonderful
> Fiance who has
> promised to get me the Plat Edition once I get a
> Toon to 20. I live
> in NNY about 35 minutes from the Canadian border.
>
> Looking forward to getting to know you and
> perhaps hunting with
> some of you on Xegony..feel free to send a tell if
> you play that
> server..will most likely be on Kailerii for the time
> being.
>
>
> May your travels keep you
> safe;
> Kailerii..DE
> Necro of the 10th Rank
> (Sherri)
>
>
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
http://home.comcast.net/~melanieroark
